name: AWS Security Hub
short: A centralized service on AWS that helps you manage security alerts and automate compliance checks.
description: AWS Security Hub is a comprehensive security and compliance service that aggregates and prioritizes security findings from across AWS services and partner tools. It provides a unified view of your security posture, highlighting potential issues and actions to mitigate risks. It comes with built-in automated security checks and integrates with AWS Organizations for multi-account management. By consolidating security data in one place, Security Hub simplifies security management and enhances your ability to meet compliance requirements.
